# The InsertValue Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Functions in this group only apply to instructions that map to llvm::ExtractValue and llvm::InsertValue instances. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Functions in this group only apply to instructions that map to llvm::ExtractValue and llvm::InsertValue instances.
